name: THE HEARTFELT GIFT
description:
A survival game made for my friends and family.

your goal is to feed the machine resources otherwise u die

controls:

E inventory

backspace: unequip tool

escape: closes inventory

R: rotates while in build mode

T: tilts while in build mode

Y: places while in build mode

C: crafting menu

E: closes build mode while in build mode

hold Q: show lamp
